verses.verse: "As for <S%H259>me,<s%> in the first <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H4075>Mede,<s%> I <S%H5977>stood<s%> up to <S%H2388>confirm<s%> and strengthen <S%H4581>him.<s%>

Now will I <S%H5046>show<s%> you the <S%H571>truth.<s%> <S%H5975>Behold,<s%> there shall stand up yet <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> in <S%H6539>Persia;<s%> and the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> shall be <S%H6239>far<s%> <S%H6238>richer<s%> than they <S%H1419>all:<s%> and when he has grown <S%H2393>strong<s%> through his <S%H6239>riches,<s%> he shall stir <S%H5782>up<s%> all against the <S%H4438>realm<s%> of <S%H3120>Greece.<s%>
A <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> shall stand <S%H5975>up,<s%> who shall <S%H4910>rule<s%> with <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4474>dominion,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to his <S%H7522>will.<s%>

When he shall stand <S%H5975>up,<s%> his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken,<s%> and shall be <S%H2673>divided<s%> toward the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> but not to his <S%H319>posterity,<s%> nor according to his <S%H4915>dominion<s%> with which he <S%H4910>ruled;<s%> for his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> shall be plucked <S%H5428>up,<s%> even for others besides <S%H312>these.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> and one of his <S%H8269>princes;<s%> and he shall be <S%H2388>strong<s%> above <S%H4910>him,<s%> and have dominion; his <S%H4475>dominion<s%> shall be a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4474>dominion.<s%>

At the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> they shall join themselves <S%H2266>together;<s%> and the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4339>agreement:<s%> but she shall not <S%H6113>retain<s%> the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of her <S%H2220>arm;<s%> neither shall he <S%H5975>stand,<s%> nor his <S%H2220>arm;<s%> but she shall be given <S%H5414>up,<s%> and those who <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3205>her,<s%> and he who became the father of <S%H2388>her,<s%> and he who strengthened her in those <S%H6256>times.<s%>

But out of a <S%H5342>shoot<s%> from her <S%H8328>roots<s%> shall one stand <S%H5975>up<s%> in his <S%H3653>place,<s%> who shall <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H2428>army,<s%> and shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H4581>fortress<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> against <S%H2388>them,<s%> and shall prevail.

Also their <S%H430>gods,<s%> with their molten <S%H5257>images,<s%> and with their <S%H2532>goodly<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> shall he <S%H935>carry<s%> <S%H7628>captive<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and he shall <S%H5975>refrain<s%> some <S%H8141>years<s%> from the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north.<s%>
He shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4438>realm<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south,<s%> but he shall <S%H7725>return<s%> into his own <S%H127>land.<s%>

His <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H1624>war,<s%> and shall <S%H622>assemble<s%> a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2428>forces,<s%> which <S%H935>shall<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7857>on,<s%> and overflow, and pass <S%H5674>through;<s%> and they shall <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H1624>war,<s%> even to his <S%H4581>fortress.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall be moved with <S%H4843>anger,<s%> and shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H4428>him,<s%> even with the king of the <S%H6828>north;<s%> and he shall set <S%H5975>forth<s%> a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> and the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

The <S%H1995>multitude<s%> shall be lifted <S%H7311>up,<s%> and his <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall be <S%H7311>exalted;<s%> and he shall cast <S%H5307>down<s%> tens of <S%H7239>thousands,<s%> but he shall not <S%H5810>prevail.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and shall set <S%H5975>forth<s%> a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> <S%H7227>greater<s%> than the <S%H7223>former;<s%> and he <S%H935>shall<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> on at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of the <S%H6256>times,<s%> even of <S%H8141>years,<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> and with <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H7399>substance.<s%>

In those <S%H6256>times<s%> there shall <S%H7227>many<s%> stand <S%H5975>up<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south:<s%> also the children of the <S%H1121>violent<s%> among your <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H5375>lift<s%> themselves up to <S%H5975>establish<s%> the <S%H2377>vision;<s%> but they shall <S%H3782>fall.<s%>

So the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and cast <S%H8210>up<s%> a <S%H5550>mound,<s%> and <S%H3920>take<s%> a <S%H4013>well-fortified<s%> <S%H5892>city:<s%> and the <S%H2220>forces<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall not <S%H5975>stand,<s%> neither his <S%H4005>chosen<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> neither shall there be any <S%H3581>strength<s%> to <S%H5975>stand.<s%>

But he who <S%H935>comes<s%> against him shall <S%H6213>do<s%> according to his own <S%H7522>will,<s%> and none shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5975>him;<s%> and he shall stand in the <S%H6643>glorious<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be <S%H3617>destruction.<s%>

He shall <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> with the <S%H8633>strength<s%> of his whole <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and with him <S%H3477>equitable<s%> <S%H6213>conditions;<s%> and he shall perform <S%H5414>them:<s%> and he shall give him the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H802>women,<s%> to <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> <S%H5975>her;<s%> but she shall not stand, neither be for him.

After this shall he <S%H7760>turn<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H339>islands,<s%> and shall <S%H3920>take<s%> <S%H7227>many:<s%> but a <S%H7101>prince<s%> shall cause the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> offered by him to <S%H7673>cease;<s%> <S%H1115>yes,<s%> moreover, he shall cause his <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to turn on <S%H7725>him.<s%>

Then he shall <S%H7725>turn<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H4581>fortresses<s%> of his own <S%H776>land;<s%> but he shall <S%H3782>stumble<s%> and <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and shall not be <S%H4672>found.<s%>

Then shall stand <S%H5975>up<s%> in his <S%H3653>place<s%> <S%H5674>one<s%> who shall cause a <S%H5065>tax<s%> collector to pass through the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> to maintain its <S%H1925>glory;<s%> but within <S%H259>few<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> he shall be <S%H7665>destroyed,<s%> neither in <S%H639>anger,<s%> nor in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

In his <S%H3653>place<s%> shall stand <S%H5975>up<s%> a contemptible <S%H959>person,<s%> to whom they had not <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H1935>honor<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom:<s%> but he shall <S%H935>come<s%> in time of <S%H7962>security,<s%> and shall <S%H2388>obtain<s%> the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> by <S%H2519>flatteries.<s%>

The <S%H7858>overwhelming<s%> <S%H2220>forces<s%> shall be <S%H7857>overwhelmed<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7665>him,<s%> and shall be broken; <S%H5057>yes,<s%> also the prince of the <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

After the <S%H2266>treaty<s%> made with him he shall <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H4820>deceitfully;<s%> for he shall come <S%H5927>up,<s%> and shall become <S%H6105>strong,<s%> with a <S%H4592>small<s%> <S%H1471>people.<s%>

In time of <S%H7962>security<s%> shall he <S%H935>come<s%> even on the fattest <S%H4924>places<s%> of the <S%H4082>province;<s%> and he shall <S%H6213>do<s%> that which his <S%H1>fathers<s%> have not <S%H6213>done,<s%> nor his <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1>fathers;<s%> he shall <S%H967>scatter<s%> among them <S%H961>prey,<s%> and <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> and <S%H7399>substance:<s%> <S%H2803>yes,<s%> he shall devise his <S%H4284>devices<s%> against the <S%H4013>strongholds,<s%> even for a <S%H6256>time.<s%>

He shall stir <S%H5782>up<s%> his <S%H3581>power<s%> and his <S%H3824>courage<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>army;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall <S%H1624>war<s%> in <S%H4421>battle<s%> with an <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H2428>army;<s%> but he shall not <S%H5975>stand;<s%> for they shall <S%H2803>devise<s%> devices against <S%H4284>him.<s%>

<S%H398>Yes,<s%> they who eat of his <S%H6598>dainties<s%> shall <S%H7665>destroy<s%> <S%H2428>him,<s%> and his army shall <S%H7857>overflow;<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> down <S%H2491>slain.<s%>

As for <S%H8147>both<s%> these <S%H4428>kings,<s%> their <S%H3824>hearts<s%> shall be to do <S%H4827>mischief,<s%> and they shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> at <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7979>table:<s%> but it shall not <S%H6743>prosper;<s%> for yet the <S%H7093>end<s%> shall be at the time <S%H4150>appointed.<s%>

Then shall he <S%H7725>return<s%> into his <S%H776>land<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7399>substance;<s%> and his <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall be against the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1285>covenant;<s%> and he shall <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H7725>pleasure,<s%> and return to his own <S%H776>land.<s%>

At the time <S%H4150>appointed<s%> he shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H5045>south;<s%> but it shall not be in the <S%H314>latter<s%> time as it was in the <S%H7223>former.<s%>

For <S%H6716>ships<s%> of <S%H3794>Kittim<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> against <S%H3512>him;<s%> therefore he shall be grieved, and shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and have <S%H2194>indignation<s%> against the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and shall <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H7725>pleasure:<s%> he shall even return, and have <S%H995>regard<s%> to those who <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

<S%H2220>Forces<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> on his <S%H2490>part,<s%> and they shall profane the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> even the <S%H4581>fortress,<s%> and shall take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5414>offering,<s%> and they shall set up the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> that makes <S%H8074>desolate.<s%>

Such as do <S%H7561>wickedly<s%> against the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> shall he <S%H2610>pervert<s%> by <S%H2514>flatteries;<s%> but the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3045>know<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> shall be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> and do <S%H6213>exploits.<s%>

Those who are <S%H7919>wise<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H995>instruct<s%> <S%H7227>many;<s%> yet they shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and by <S%H3852>flame,<s%> by <S%H7628>captivity<s%> and by <S%H961>spoil,<s%> many <S%H3117>days.<s%>

Now when they shall <S%H3782>fall,<s%> they shall be <S%H5826>helped<s%> with a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H5828>help;<s%> but <S%H7227>many<s%> shall <S%H3867>join<s%> themselves to them with <S%H2519>flatteries.<s%>

Some of those who are <S%H7919>wise<s%> shall <S%H3782>fall,<s%> to <S%H6884>refine<s%> <S%H1305>them,<s%> and to purify, and to make them <S%H3835>white,<s%> even to the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end;<s%> because it is yet for the time <S%H4150>appointed.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> according to his <S%H7522>will;<s%> and he shall <S%H7311>exalt<s%> <S%H1431>himself,<s%> and magnify himself above every <S%H410>god,<s%> and shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> marvelous <S%H6381>things<s%> against the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H410>gods;<s%> and he shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%> until the <S%H2195>indignation<s%> be <S%H3615>accomplished;<s%> for that which is <S%H2782>determined<s%> shall be <S%H6213>done.<s%>

Neither shall he <S%H995>regard<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> nor the <S%H2532>desire<s%> of <S%H802>women,<s%> nor <S%H995>regard<s%> any <S%H433>god;<s%> for he shall magnify himself above <S%H1431>all.<s%>

But in his <S%H3653>place<s%> shall he <S%H3513>honor<s%> the <S%H433>god<s%> of <S%H4581>fortresses;<s%> and a <S%H433>god<s%> whom his <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know shall he <S%H3513>honor<s%> with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and with <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and pleasant <S%H2532>things.<s%>

He shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> with the <S%H4581>strongest<s%> <S%H4013>fortresses<s%> by the help of a <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H433>god:<s%> whoever <S%H5234>acknowledges<s%> him he will <S%H7235>increase<s%> with <S%H3519>glory;<s%> and he shall cause them to <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H7227>many,<s%> and shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> for a <S%H4242>price.<s%>

At the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end<s%> shall the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H5055>contend<s%> with <S%H4428>him;<s%> and the king of the <S%H6828>north<s%> shall come against him like a <S%H8175>whirlwind,<s%> with <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and with <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and with <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H591>ships;<s%> and he shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H776>countries,<s%> and shall <S%H7857>overflow<s%> and pass <S%H5674>through.<s%>

He shall <S%H935>enter<s%> also into the <S%H6643>glorious<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> countries shall be <S%H3782>overthrown;<s%> but these shall be <S%H4422>delivered<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and the <S%H7225>chief<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>
He shall stretch <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> also on the <S%H776>countries;<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall not <S%H6413>escape.<s%>

But he shall have <S%H4910>power<s%> over the <S%H4362>treasures<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and over all the <S%H2532>precious<s%> things of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and the <S%H3864>Libyans<s%> and the <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> shall be at his <S%H4703>steps.<s%>

But <S%H8052>news<s%> out of the <S%H4217>east<s%> and out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> shall <S%H926>trouble<s%> <S%H3318>him;<s%> and he shall go forth with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2534>fury<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> and utterly to sweep <S%H2763>away<s%> <S%H7227>many.<s%>

He shall <S%H5193>plant<s%> the <S%H168>tents<s%> of his <S%H643>palace<s%> between the <S%H3220>sea<s%> and the <S%H6643>glorious<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> yet he shall <S%H935>come<s%> to his <S%H7093>end,<s%> and none shall help <S%H5826>him.<s%>
